channel.description: Web APIs Interface to Web Application Access & Modify Server Resources Defines Endpoints, Parameters, Responses Built on HTTP Example - Twilio EXCLAMATION_MARK='!' curl -X POST https://api.twilio.com/2010-04-01/Accounts/$TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID/Messages.json \ --data-urlencode "Body=Hi there$EXCLAMATION_MARK" \ --data-urlencode "From=+15017122661" \ --data-urlencode "To=+15558675310" \ -u $TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID:$TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN Response { "account_sid": "ACXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX", "api_version": "2010-04-01", "body": "Hi there!", "date_created": "Thu, 30 Jul 2015 20:12:31 +0000", "date_sent": "Thu, 30 Jul 2015 20:12:33 +0000", "date_updated": "Thu, 30 Jul 2015 20:12:33 +0000", "
